SubjectAmendment to the terms and conditions of employment of the special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers’ Ombudsman
PrecisAmendment to the terms and conditions of employment of the special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers’ Ombudsman, set out by Order in Council P.C. 2007-828 of May 24, 2007, effective February 18, 2011.
